document_data.caption: A map showing Swords Street and surroundings in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Swords Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Swords Street''' was a major road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Swords Street was located on the western side of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. It ran north to south, running parallel with the [[Street of Silks]] to the east. Swords Street originated in the north on [[Calamastyr Lane]], branching south then turning southeast west of [[Bazaar Street]] before turning due south again. The road ended where it met [[Waterdeep Way]] in front of [[Piergeiron's Palace]]. Other roads crossing Swords Street included [[Keltarn Street]], [[Tharleon Street]], [[Selduth Street]], [[Tchozal's Race]], [[Sevenlamps Cut]], and [[Turnback Court]].
